name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: Smartphone
description: Feature-rich smartphone with a 6.2-inch screen, 12MP dual camera, 128GB storage, and a 4000mAh battery.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Watches
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Speakers
description: High-quality wireless headphones with over-ear design, 20 hours of battery life, and a sleek black color.

name: Television
description: Smartwatch with a 1.3-inch AMOLED display, water-resistant design, fitness tracking features, and a stylish silver color.

name: Washing Machine
description: fully automatic washing machine with 7kg capacity, multiple wash programs, and energy-efficient operation.

name: Air Conditioner
description: Smart AC with 1.5 ton  capacity, inverter technology, and eco-friendly refrigerant for efficient cooling.

name: Oven
description: Convection oven  with  multiple cooking modes, digital controls, and a spacious interior for versatile baking.

name: Refrigerator
description: Double-door refrigerator with 300L capacity, frost-free technology, and energy-efficient performance.

name: Geyser
description: Electric   geyser  with 25L capacity, rapid heating, and safety features for reliable hot water supply.

name: Trademill
description: Folding treadmill with adjustable speed, built-in workout programs, and a compact design for home fitness.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: Smart doorbell with HD video, two-way audio, motion detection, and mobile app integration for enhanced home security.

name: Airpods
description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and seamless integration with Apple devices.

name: Gaming Console
description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K resolution, immersive graphics, and a vast library of games.
